detail_desc: Top in sweatshirt fabric with a high collar and zip at the top with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline at the front, medium coverage at the back and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized shirt jacket in sturdy twill with a brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, and a yoke with a pleat and hanger loop at the back. Welt front pockets and flap chest pockets with a button. One of the chest pockets has a Kangol logo. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Quilted lining made from recycled polyester.

Kangol x H&M. Short, padded jacket with a stand-up collar, padded hood and Kangol logo above the hem. Contrasting colour zip down the front, discreet front pockets with a concealed zip, and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Recycled polyester lining.

Set with a pair of joggers and a hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a matching T-shirt in organic cotton jersey. Joggers with an elasticated, drawstring waist, discreet side pockets and ribbed hems. Hoodie with a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. T-shirt with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.

Wide, calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and a small opening with ties at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems and a skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
Fitted blouse in an airy cotton weave with a sweetheart neckline, gathers at the front and short puff sleeves with elastication around the shoulders and hems.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Unlined.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Discreet pockets in the side seams and a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a unique nursing feature. V-neck, short sleeves, a wide tie belt under the bust, and slits in the sides. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Knee-length nursing dress in a patterned viscose weave with a double layer at the front and practical inner top for easier nursing access. Opening and button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with a flounce over the shoulders, and elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Knee-length dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature, a hood and long sleeves. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Short dress in an airy viscose weave with a unique nursing feature. Small, frilled collar and a V-shaped opening with ties at the neck. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. The design includes a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.

Nursing top in soft, stretch fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with a functional fastening for easier nursing access and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Dress in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.

Knee-length dress in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist.

Knee-length dress in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist.
Long-sleeved nursing tops in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved nursing tops in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft rib knit with a round neckline and slits in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline and dropped shoulders.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with notch lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Defined shoulders, long sleeves and diagonal side pockets with a recycled polyester lining. Seam with a tie belt and button at the waist, a zip fly and straight, ankle-length legs with creases.
Short, A-line dress in imitation leather with a large, frill-trimmed collar, buttons down the front and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, patch front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with darts and a concealed zip at the top and a deep neckline with a small frill trim in a contrasting colour. Seam at the waist and a gathered, flared skirt. Seersucker apron with wide ties and decorative satin ribbon trims at the hem. Lining in a recycled polyester and cotton blend.

Short dress in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and frill-trimmed yoke with inset lace trims. Opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck, wide sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs, and concealed, narrow elastication at the waist. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in an airy viscose weave with embroidery at the top and seams at the front with wide, gathered flounces that fall over the shoulders. Opening and button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with an opening and button at the cuffs. Seam with concealed elastication at the waist and a flared, airy skirt.
Metal keyring with a shimmering mini backpack in imitation leather. The backpack has a zip at the top, embroidery and appliqués.
Metal keyring with a shimmering mini backpack in imitation leather. The backpack has a zip at the top, embroidery and appliqués.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Fitted vest top in ribbed cotton jersey with a slightly deeper neckline at the back.
Short skirt in quilted imitation leather with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Hoodie in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Double-layered hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and covered elastication at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a tie detail at the hem. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Anklets in different designs of thin metal chain. Adjustable length.

Ankle boots in imitation leather with a tongue and lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Adjustable straps with a metal buckle around the ankle and over the foot. Linings and insoles in fabric made from recycled polyester. Chunky, patterned soles. Heel 5 cm. Platform 4.5 cm.
Thin metal chain anklets, one with plastic beads and one with round metal pendants. Adjustable length.
Wide blouse in soft leather with a grandad collar, V-shaped opening at the front and a covered button at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
Wide blouse in soft leather with a grandad collar, V-shaped opening at the front and a covered button at the neck. Long, wide sleeves with narrow cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with an embroidered text on the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Hoodie in soft faux shearling with an embroidered text on the front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Bikini top with short sleeves, a wide neckline and drawstring at the front. Narrow elastication at the top, hem and around the sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and medium coverage at the back.

Long, flared dress in soft lace made from a cotton blend with mesh sections. Double-layered stand-up collar and an opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long balloon sleeves with double cuffs and covered buttons. Gathered seam over the bum for added width. V-neck underdress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Calf-length dress in a woven wool blend with a round neckline and concealed zip at the front. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Calf-length skirt in supple leather. High waist with covered elastication and a frill trim, a zip at the back and pockets in the side seams. Lined at the top.

Voluminous, straight-cut shirt in soft leather with a collar, covered buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and long, wide sleeves with gathers and narrow, buttoned cuffs. Rounded, raw-edge hem.
Hoodie in soft, warming faux shearling with a lined hood and zip at the top. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Wide trousers in a wool weave. High waist with belt loops and pleats for added width, a zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners, and discreet side pockets.
Fitted T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a washed look. Print motif on the chest, a fabric appliqué just above the hem and trims around the neckline and sleeves.
Straight-cut jacket in a soft, textured weave with notch lapels and a button decorated with a pearly bead at the front. Patch front pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, a kangaroo pocket, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in softly draping, fine-ribbed jersey made from a silk blend with extra-long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
